import React from 'react'; import Footer from './Footer'; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; const Contact=()=> { const notify = () => toast("Your message has been sent"); function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_tkoh5lq', 'template_v941tzv', e.target, 'user_RLHPxZd4oezjA7l4DNIdh') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); notify() }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); e.target.reset() } return ( <>
